Paper.Title: Semantic Role Labeling with Boosting, SVMs, Maximum Entropy, SNOW, and Decision Lists

Section.Paragraph: This paper describes the HKPolyU-HKUST systems which were entered into the Semantic Role Labeling task in Senseval-3. Results show that these systems, which are based upon common machine learning algorithms, all manage to achieve good performances on the non-restricted Semantic Role Labeling task.
